page.title: Blood Oranges
page.text: Blood oranges are a type of [[Oranges|orange.]] We just love [[oranges]].

page.title: New Haven
page.text: Many people live here and commute to [[New York]]. There are no [[skyscrapers]] here.

page.title: Aluminum Foil
page.text: Used in kitchens, made out of [[aluminum]].
